thread.title: Polixni1 Polixni1
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Polixni1 Polixni1

author: Polixni1 Polixni1
title: Polixni1 Polixni1
text:
I bought a AT9 with express shiping DHL from Germany warehouse..
Arrived after 45 days, they gave me 4-5 fake tracking numbers and the product was defective with broken screen and cut cables inside!!
They never replied even to paypal so i got a full refund from Paypal..
also they have many diffent profiles on ebay and they sent faulty or very low quality products that they never refund...
NEVER BUY AGAIN!!!
